CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 23, reads: "Tasty Bites - Lovely Mrs. Catherine Phillips, demonstrator for Crayton's Sausage, passes out Crayton's Taste Treats Sausage Recipe booklets while her attractive assistant, Miss Edith Berry, prepares tasty bits of Crayton's Sausage which visitors sampled."
TitMainTitle: Edith Berry preparing food while Catherine Phillips hands out recipe booklets, at Crayton's Sausage booth in Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
